entry.title: Through the Crystal Glass
entry.summary:
Author: Mooeyeddie (mooeyeddie)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,058Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: "What," Eddie spits, eyes darting from one to the other, metaphorical hackles rising on the back of his spine at the sheer nonchalance they seem to be displaying, as if they see Eddie’s doppelganger on a regular basis, “the ever loving fuck?”Buck barks a loud laugh, head thrown back, carefree. The other Eddie merely smirks, like Eddie isn’t standing there unravelling at the seams.“Buck fucks with crystals.” Older Eddie shrugs, looking so fond as he tilts his gaze to Buck.orThe 2!Eddie's 1!Buck fic

entry.title: how come everybody's dancing but you?
entry.summary:
Author: showedupatyourparty

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,407Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 501

Summary: The first time Buck had met Pepa, she’d described Eddie as a saint, and she’d been right. Buck may be fuzzy on his Art History eras, but he can conjure up plenty of images of shirtless saints, and Eddie, abs adorned with sparkles and glowy mood lighting framing his face, looks more saintly than ever before.Eddie motions Buck over. “Come meet my friends!” He turns to the woman petting his hair. “This is my friend, Buck!”The woman eyes Buck suspiciously, but without judgment. “You the baby daddy?” she asks, not unkindly.Before Buck has a chance to say no, or yes, or what?— Eddie’s face crumples, and he turns to the drag queen forlornly, muttering, “I don’t have a baby anymore,” before face-planting into her breastplate with a sob.The queen squeezes his shoulder and shushes him gently. “I know, sweetie, it’s okay. You can be our baby.”“My baby’s all grown up.”“It’s gonna be alright.”-Buck gets really into Carly Rae Jepsen. Eddie gets adopted by drag queens. They're both just doing their best to be happy.

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,279Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 139

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,655Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 23

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until Buck's letters start getting sadder, wondering why his sister won't reply to him.

entry.title: Buck's Terrible, Horrible, Very Good, Very Bad Day
entry.summary:
Author: slugcity

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,767Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 67

Summary: It's only 7:13 AM and Buck is already having a horrible day. First, he woke up late after forgetting to check that his alarm was set (rookie move) and almost immediately slammed his toes against the corner of the door frame in the bathroom. He also slipped at the bottom of the stairs in his loft in his rush out the door, and despite his tailbone reminding him every time he leans down, he is trying to forget that part.He is trying to forget all of it, honestly. It didn’t help that he pinched his fingers in the Jeep door when he went to grab his bag after he parked at the station. Unfortunately, Eddie had taken that exact moment to exist in some manner that was mildly distracting to Buck’s motor skills — Buck thinks that Eddie smiled at him, or something equally evil and disruptive — and Buck, without looking, slammed the door on his pointer and middle finger, which were sitting right in the crease of the door hinge, like they were waiting for Buck to injure himself further.-------Buck has a bad day, but maybe it's also kind of perfect.

entry.title: Fri(end)s
entry.summary:
Author: msteen02

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,151Chapters: 6/7Kudos: 122

Summary: Eddie was finally exactly where he wanted to be. He was on cloud nine after confessing his feelings for Buck, and Buck returning his confession with enthusiasm. He loved his family, and as they sat there on the couch watching a movie, Chris cuddled up on one side of him and Buck on the other, he could finally look forward to the future rather than getting hung up on the past. With Chris and Buck by his side, he couldn’t wait to explore their relationship as a family, and move on together towards the rest of their lives.OrA 5+1 story of Buck and Eddie exploring their developing relationship together, taking their time to figure out how to transition from being best friends to boyfriends, before finally breaking the news to their family at the 118.

entry.title: Between his hand - Part. 1 - Attraction
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,686Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 20

Summary: The contact of a glance, the burn of a touch, and... a dangerous game that pushes them a little closer to each other.After being abandoned by his girlfriend who ran off to Europe, Buck tries to piece himself back together. His broken heart no longer knows who to trust.When he saves the life of a child and his grandmother, he has no idea that this heroic act will change his own life. Because the child’s father, Eddie Diaz, isn’t like other men. Rich, charismatic, unpredictable… just one look from him is enough to shake all of Buck’s certainty.Buck has never been the type to submit. But in Eddie’s arms, another side of him wakes up—a side he didn’t even know existed.Until he discovers that the man who unsettles him, challenges him, and makes him come like no one else… is also the one who runs one of Los Angeles’s most powerful companies.And that their story might be more than just a game.I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

entry.title: All the Signs I Missed
entry.summary:
Author: IdoGeek

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,458Chapters: 10/13Kudos: 266

Summary: It’s not a whisper, not exactly. It’s just… matter-of-fact. Like saying it out loud isn’t the hard part. Like waiting for a reaction is.The words drop between them, sudden and small, but precise.Eddie blinks, caught mid-step.“What?”Buck searches his face. Something subtle shifts behind his eyes. “Wait… you didn’t know?”There’s no accusation in it. Just confusion. Like it never occurred to him that Eddie wouldn’t know.Eddie stares, his brain a beat behind his body. “No, I—I didn’t.” OR Buck is trans and out. So out, that most people don't think about it anymore. So when Eddie joins the 118, no one mentions it. The question is, how long will it be, until Eddie finds out? finished and will be updated daily

entry.title: let’s pretend that we’re in love (until we are)
entry.summary:
Author: karatekid1018

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,951Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 565

Summary: “I need you to propose to me.”Eddie nearly missed the mug and poured coffee on his own hand.“What?” he asked, his mouth gone dry.“I. Need you. To propose to me,” Buck repeated, as if saying it slower would somehow make it make sense.“Propose…propose marriage?”“No, a new business venture. Yes, propose marriage, Eddie, come on,” Buck scoffed.“Right, yeah, okay,” Eddie shrugged, setting down his coffee mug with a loud thunk. He turned to face Buck fully, leveling him with a wide-eyed look. “Again, I have to ask. What?”or: Buck asks his best friend Eddie to propose to him in public to see if they can score a free dessert. Eddie definitely doesn’t propose to him for real, because that would be insane. Right?
